Article: The internet of things (IoT) is becoming the internet of everything. More industries are looking to connect their machines and applications, and more users are enjoying the functionality of their smart devices. Market research firm McKinsey predicts IoT’s economic impact will be in the range of $4 trillion to $11 trillion per year by 2025. Microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) and sensors are an essential part of the IoT phenomenon.
